screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .aif file in Adobe Audition 2021
screenshot.caption: AIF file open in Adobe Audition 2021

description: Apple Computer developed the AIFF format in 1988, basing it on Electronic Arts' .IFF format. Standard AIF files use a sampling rate of 44.1KHz, are 16-bit, and have two channels for stereo sound.
AIF files are similar to .MP3 files, but they are saved in an uncompressed format, whereas MP3 files are compressed. This difference results in larger AIF files while storing higher-quality audio.
NOTE: AIF files may also be saved with the .aiff file extension ( .AIFF files).

images.alt: Screenshot of a .aif file in Adobe Audition 2021
images.caption: AIF file open in Adobe Audition 2021
